titleStmt.title: The catechisme, or maner to teach children and others the Christian fayth used in all the landes and dominions that are under the mighty Prince Frederike, the Palsgraue of ye Rhone, elector of the empyre, &c. Translated out of Latin into Englysh, by William Turner Doctor of Phisicke, easely to be vnderstanded and read, aswell of the people of the north cuntry, as others.
Heidelberger Katechismus. English.

The catechisme, or maner to teach children and others the Christian fayth used in all the landes and dominions that are under the mighty Prince Frederike, the Palsgraue of ye Rhone, elector of the empyre, &c. Translated out of Latin into Englysh, by William Turner Doctor of Phisicke, easely to be vnderstanded and read, aswell of the people of the north cuntry, as others.
Heidelberger Katechismus. English.
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iohnes, dwellyng in the vpper end of Fleetlane,

notesStmt.note: Appended, with caption title: A prayer of the repentant person taken out of Erasmus.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
